sub_title: Services Business Development Manager @ Lenovo | Sales, Growth Strategies
summary:
Suniel Kesharie is a Services Sales Specialist and Senior APOS Business Development Manager at Lenovo, a global leader in technology and innovation. With 10 years of experience in sales, operations, and relationship management, Suniel is highly motivated and ambitious to grow his career in the international business arena.

Suniel graduated Magna Cum Laude in Global Project Management with a 3.85 GPA at Davenport University in Michigan, United States, where he also achieved the President's List and became a member of the National Society and Leadership. He holds a Bachelor of Business Administration in International Business and Management Studies, as well as certifications in negotiation skills and high performance habits. Suniel is fluent in Dutch, English, and Spanish, and has a strong network of contacts across the EMEA region.

In his current role at Lenovo, Suniel is responsible for developing and executing the APOS (After Point of Sale) strategy for the services business unit, focusing on customer satisfaction, revenue growth, and profitability. He works with key accounts and internal teams to deliver solutions that meet the clients' needs and expectations, as well as to identify new opportunities and markets. Suniel also manages the communications, budgets, contracts, and timelines of the APOS projects, ensuring quality and efficiency. Suniel's previous experience as a Key Account Manager and International Sales Operator at Hitachi-LG Data Storage, a global manufacturer of optical technologies, has equipped him with valuable skills and insights in managing complex and diverse accounts, resolving issues and complaints, and collaborating with the sales team to maximize profit by up-selling or cross-selling. Suniel is passionate about learning new skills and technologies, and is always looking for ways to improve his performance and contribute to the success of his company and clients.

projects.title: Young Enterprise Project
projects.description:
''Jong Ondernemen" aims to help as many young people as possible in becoming aware of entrepreneurship. Not only are entrepreneurial skills put into practice but there is also a focus on learning about both the opportunities and challenges of running a business during studies.

Concept: Students set up and manage a company for an entire academic year.

projects.title: Dragons Den Project, Hogeschool InHolland University of Applied Science, Diemen, The Netherlands
projects.description:
Founding the student company CFY. Creating an innovative product for the mass market, where providing an Initial & Action plan, a feasibility analysis, and a business plan for the core activities. 

Presenting the company strategy and sustainability during a 'Dragons Den' presentation for 3 successful entrepreneurs, where the goal was to collect funding for realisation of the product.

Competing with other teams for the funding, our student company won the funding for the execution of our product and business plan.

My job for the project was the CEO of the student company CFY.
My task contained leading the company in the direction that it needed to go. Decision making at critical moments. Leading the day-to-day operations, ensuring the succes was obtained. Guiding and mentoring fellow members of the company. Planning, maintaining and guarding the speed of the process. Overseeing and addressing unexpected changes during the life of the company CFY.

profile_positions.description:
As a dedicated Sales Specialist, I excel in achieving revenue-based quotas through strategic sales initiatives and fostering lasting client relationships. With a keen eye on the market and fluency in crafting solutions, I work within dedicated territories to provide exceptional customer experiences.

🚀 Results-Driven Approach: I thrive on exceeding expectations, consistently meeting revenue targets by leveraging my strong product knowledge to effectively address client needs.

💼 Territory Expertise: Working within focused territories, I've mastered the art of tailoring solutions to match unique client requirements, driving engagement and upsell opportunities.

📊 Forecasting Excellence: My meticulous approach ensures accurate sales forecasts on a weekly, monthly, and quarterly basis, contributing to data-driven decision-making.

🤝 Partnership and Collaboration: I build and nurture robust relationships with internal and external stakeholders, ensuring seamless collaboration and customer-centric solutions.

📞 Exceptional Outreach: Handling a high volume of outbound customer contacts through both phone and email, I maintain professionalism while delivering impactful messages.

🔑 Problem Solving and Objection Handling: Armed with a technical understanding of our products and services, I proactively address concerns and objections, retaining clients and converting new ones.

🌐 Customer-Centric Mindset: My dedication to ensuring customer satisfaction extends to addressing roadblocks, fostering loyalty, and seizing opportunities for growth.

🔄 Continuous Process Enhancement: Collaborating with cross-functional teams and management, I contribute to optimizing sales processes and systems for a superior customer experience.

📈 CRM Mastery: By meticulously maintaining our Customer Management System, I ensure that critical data is captured in a timely manner, supporting informed decision-making.
profile_positions.title: Services Sales Specialist - Senior APOS Business Development Manager

profile_positions.description:
Strategic Key Account Manager | Building Trust, Driving Growth

As an accomplished Key Account Manager, I specialize in fostering unwavering partnerships with major clients, ensuring their needs and expectations are not only met but exceeded. My expertise lies in resolving challenges, anticipating shifts, and spearheading strategic initiatives that drive success.

- Developing a solid and trusting relationship between major key clients and company
- Resolving key client issues and complaints
- Developing a complete understanding of key account needs
- Anticipating key account changes and improvements
- Managing communications between key clients and internal teams
- Managing account team assigned to each client
- Strategic planning to improve client results
- Negotiating contracts with the client and establishing a timeline of performance
- Establishing and overseeing internal budgets with the company and external budgets with the client
- Collaborating with the sales team to maximize profit by up-selling or cross-selling
- Planning and presenting reports on account progress, goals, and quarterly initiatives to share with team members, stakeholders, and possible use in future case studies or company training
- Meeting all client needs and deliverables according to proposed timelines
- Analyzing client data to provide customer relationship management
- Expanding relationships and bringing in new clients
profile_positions.title: Key Account Manager (EMEA)

profile_positions.description:
Working for the European branch of Hitachi- LG Data Storage, a Joint-Venture company between the Japanese Hitachi and South-Korean LGE Electronics. The company is a global manufacturer of optical disc drives, wireless charging and other optical technologies.
In our European branch we focus on sales and aftermarket services within the EMEA region.

Task included are: creating and monitoring order overviews from initial order to delivery, Project Management (small scale), Stock Management, Quality Assurance, Sales Reporting, International Customer Care B2B, Stakeholder Management, E-count Management, Order Management.
profile_positions.title: International Sales Operator

profile_positions.description: Part of the Amsterdam based team responsible for further enhancing the digital onboarding solution of SAFENED. SAFENED’s platform is powered by advanced machine learning algorithms and is used by its partners to identify customers, increase trust and prevent fraud.
profile_positions.title: CDD Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Moyee Coffee is the world's first FairChain coffee brand.

My tasks in Operations:
- Monitoring, analyzing, adapting the stock level both locally and abroad (Ethiopia).
- Maintaining inventory, last minute deliveries and interacting with clients visits. 
-  Setting up and organizing the digital archive of Operations. 
- Analyzing the logistics and adjusting where necessary. 
- Implementing process improvements to increase efficiency and quality. 

My task for Customer Care (B2B, B2C): 
- First contact point for all clients and customers of Moyee.
- Monitoring all incoming questions, request, complaints and all general communications. 
- Presenting relevant (and/or current) issues to the correct departments. 
- Creating manuals for all CC tasks. 

Additionally I will be writing my Thesis for Moyee.
profile_positions.title: Operations & Customer Care (B2B, B2C)

profile_positions.description:
Computer Futures is one of the world’s most dynamic and renowned IT-Recruitment Agency.

We support IT-professionals in finding the best IT-jobs and companies with recruiting the most talented IT-specialists, for permanent positions and contract base. 

Because of their expertise within the specific IT-domain, our consultants can offer direct and realistic solutions for your recruitment needs.

Every 38 minutes we place an IT-professional at the right function. Visit the section “candidates” and let us know how we can enhance your career.
profile_positions.title: Recruitment Consultant (Open Source)

profile_positions.description: My internship’s responsibilities will be to provide support to the reservations and marketing division of the company. These responsibilities will include, but not be limited to, guest profiles, compiling marketing and sales statistics, the upkeep of our client databases, and basic translational services.
profile_positions.title: Business Development - Marketing & Sales Intern

profile_positions.description:
Job Purpose:
A part-time job next to my Bachelor education, where the main purpose is to advise customers in their purchases in the IT computer Hardware and Software.
profile_positions.title: Sales Representative

profile_positions.description:
Job Purpose:
Managing the day-to-day operations of the brand TomTom in the Saturn Flagship Store in Amsterdam.

Tasks:
Realising weekly sales target. Negotiating with advisors and decision makers internally and externally.
Providing training and educating sales members and colleagues. Familiarizing colleagues from the Headquarters of TomTom in sales. Delivering monthly sales analyses to Sales Manager. 
Gathering and analysing Marketing Information regarding Amsterdam consumer data.
Representing the first physical “showroom” store of TomTom
Being a sales representative of TomTom and advising customers with their purchases.
profile_positions.title: SIS Manager TomTom

profile_positions.description:
Job Purpose: 
Advising, planning & monitoring of advertising campaigns; selling advertising space on television & radio stations and the websites of the Dutch Public Broadcasting (NPO) to optimize revenue.

Tasks: 
Maintaining the client contact with existing and new customer contacts, where the needs of customers need to be identified to create sales opportunities. Informing and advising clients of available space for commercial use. Proactive sales of unsold commercial space combined with planned sales promotions. Evaluating and monitoring campaigns and adjusting them to ensure client satisfaction.  
Handling clients request for new TV and/or radio campaign, processing and placing them. Provide feedback to clients and internal clients.
profile_positions.title: (jr.) Sales Executive TV

profile_positions.description:
Job Purpose: 
The preparation of broadcast advertising blocks on the television and radio stations of the Dutch Public Broadcasting (NPO) to achieve an optimal broadcast.

Tasks: 
Receiving, processing and controlling instructions and broadcast transmission logs according to instructions and technical specifications.
Processing commercials for Netherlands 1, 2 and 3 and Radio 1, 2, 3FM, 4, 5 and 6. Processing and adjusting new and existing campaigns. Controlling blocks and providing optimized block usage, establishing quality and handling customer requests.
Creating the broadcast log for all TV and radio channels and delivering it before deadline. Maintaining internal and external customer relationships. Providing relevant information for Buma / Stemra.
profile_positions.title: Traffic RTV

profile_positions.description:
Tasks: 
Handles requests for accounting for time schedules, approves and processes the submitted commercials, process changes and / or changes in campaigns, making the broadcast log for Radio & TV and delivers them to set deadline, deals with telephone and mail traffic with media agencies and direct customers, make barter contracts and monitors them, making sales overview and reports them weekly to Sales Director, provides quarterly rates and processes them in traffic, handles billing, provides registration for Buma / Stemra, Archives and contracts and manages customer information files, supports the Account and Sales Director, all administrative work performed.
profile_positions.title: Planning & Traffic

volunteer_experiences.description: During Spring Break, we offered relief to Flood Victims and Poverty with home demolition and home construction, clean up work in public parks and playground, and clean up and moving services in South Carolina, United States of America.
